directions: Combine chicken broth, kidney beans, parsnips, portobello mushrooms, onion, ham, carrots, celery, garlic, thyme, oregano, Sriracha sauce, and bay leaves in a 6-quart pot; bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 45 minutes. Add kale and simmer until tender, about 15 minutes.
ingredients: 1 cup diced ham, fat removed, or more to taste
1 cup chopped kale, or to taste
title: Ham, Parsnip, and Kale Soup
